title: 重生时mc就崩溃，而且mc在崩溃后无法打开
author: kururu123
txt_content:
就连进服也这样
Minecraft has crashed!            ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
A full error report has been saved to /Users/Wu/Library/Application Support/minecraft/crash-reports/crash-2012-12-28_16.43.16-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: 孤剩
replies.txt_content: 是什么版本的，是原版还是懒人包？

replies.author: kururu123
replies.txt_content: 1.4.6 原版 加了TMI 和 rei

replies.author: city49
replies.txt_content:
可能是加了MOD出了毛病，另外，这个报错的信息这么专业- -我们这些不知道内部接口的人，看了也白搭啊。
而且错误日志开始就说明了，请把这个发给Mojang...（好吧，当我没说。）
